title: Fragrance Queen Discusses Embracing Diversity
itunes:title: Fragrance Queen Discusses Embracing Diversity
description:
Linda G. Levy, President of The Fragrance Foundation, aka the “Fragrance Queen,” discusses bringing diversity and inclusion to the industry with the #FragranceForwardTFF initiative.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
